It hosts corporate events and weddings with its meeting hall equipped with modern meeting facilities and 3 meeting rooms of different sizes. Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Istanbul Sultanahmet; It is within walking distance of the Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Basilica Cistern, Beyazit and the Blue Mosque, and provides easy access to Taksim and Istanbul Airport with the Vezneciler metro line.Wyndham

name: Aspera Hotel Altunizade
description: Located in the Asian side of Istanbul, this stylish hotel offers luxurious interiors and comfortable rooms with modern amenities. Facilities include a spa&health club with a fitness centre and a chic restaurant serving international cuisine. Capitol Shopping Centre is only 350 metres from Aspera Hotel Altunizade with many eateries and shops of the famous brands while Akasya Shopping Centre is 3.5 km away from the property. The elegant rooms of Aspera Hotel Altunizade are tastefully furnished in soft colours to create a peaceful atmosphere. They are all decorated with chic chandeliers and wallpapers. Each morning, a rich breakfast is served as an open buffet with cereals, fruits and home-baked bread at Agio Restaurant for lunch and dinner, the à la carte restaurant serves international cuisine. Delicious drinks are provided by the hotel’s bar to finish off the day. The spa centre includes a Turkish bath, massage facilities and a sauna. Meeting facilities are also provided on site. Aspera Hotel Altunizade is just a few steps from Altunizade Metro Station. Emaar Square Mall is a 15-minutes drive from the property. Acıbadem Altunizade Hospital is only 400 metres away from Aspera Hotel Altunizade. Este World Plastic Surgery Centre is 400 metres from the property and Newest Plastic Surgery Centre is only 200 metres away. Vakıfbank Sports Arena is 1.2 km and Ulker Sports Arena is 7.3 km from the property. The main road which connects Asia to Europe is only 100 metres away. Viaport Outlet Centre and Sabiha Gokcen Airport are a 39 minute drive from the hotel. Istanbul Airport is 57 km away.

name: The St. Regis Istanbul
address: Mim Kemal Oke Cad No 35, Istanbul 34367
description: Capture possibilities at The St. Regis Istanbul, where timeless glamor and modern innovation meet. Nestled by the cosmopolitan Nişantaşı district, our 5 star hotel offers Istanbul's best address, surrounded by designer boutiques, luxury fashion brands, local eateries and European edifices of the Art Deco and Art Nouveau eras. Our luxury hotel provides a shining beacon of hospitality, featuring our signature St. Regis Butler Service to attend to your needs. Experience exquisite rooftop dinner at Wolfgang Puck's Spago or savor international cuisine on the verdant terrace of St. Regis Brasserie. Luxuriate with a bespoke treatment inside our Iridium Spa, before drifting off to sleep in our award-winning hotel suites, adorned with original artwork and discreet balconies overlooking tomorrow's adventures. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets with their own special accommodation rates.Marriott

name: Selectum City Atasehir
description: Set in Istanbul, 15 km from Maiden's Tower, Selectum City Ataşehir offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. All rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Selectum City Ataşehir have a sea view. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Selectum City Ataşehir can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam. Dolmabahce Palace is 19 km from Selectum City Ataşehir, while Dolmabahce Clock Tower is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Yasmak Sultan
description: Occupying a lively corner in Istanbul's historic Sultanahmet district, Hotel Yasmak Sultan offers spacious rooms with free WiFi. It features a traditional Turkish spa, indoor pool and a panoramic restaurant. Yasmak’s rooms are elegantly furnished and offer a private bathroom with marbled countertop basin and a bathtub. Each is equipped with a satellite TV while some rooms include a seating area. Hotel Sultan’s spa comprises a marbled Turkish hammam and a dry sauna. Guests can also enjoy a relaxing massage or work out in the gym. The Olive Restaurant serves Turkish and international cuisine with a scenic view, overlooking the Topkapi Palace and Bosphorus Straight beyond. A variety of refreshing beverages and snacks are offered at the Lobby Bar. Staff at Hotel Yasmak Sultan can provide a car rental service and advice on city excursions. Ataturk Airport is a 15-minute drive away while Istanbul Airport is 52 km away.

name: Le Méridien Istanbul Etiler
address: Cengiz Topel Caddesi No: 39, Etiler, Istanbul 34337
description: Rising a stunning 34 stories above the city, this 5-star hotel in prestigious Etiler district enjoys a prime location from which to explore the prolific historic landmarks and many stylish restaurants, bars and boutiques Istanbul has to offer. Bask in unique panoramic views over the Bosphorus and Istanbul iconic bridges. Unlock Istanbul's best experiences from our luxury hotel while relaxing in a private cabana by the outdoor pool, indulging in a traditional Hamam or savoring classic Turkish dishes with a modern twist. A creative tribute to modernity and tradition, our 255 rooms and suites blend chic contemporary artwork and furnishings with classic Turkish motifs. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame stunning uninterrupted views of the city and the Bosphorus. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee. Host your next meeting or event at our conference hotel. We offer over 2500 sqm of event space, plenty of on-site parking and superb catering.Marriott

name: The Westin Istanbul Nisantasi
description: Welcome to the first Westin hotel in Türkiye. Our 5-star hotel is conveniently located in the vibrant shopping district of Nişantaşı. Its location in the same mixed-use complex as the brand-new Lotus Walk shopping center provides easy access to renowned for its designer boutiques, wide selection of eateries, bars, art galleries, concert halls, convention centers and leading medical offices. Explore the city using the metro line directly accessible from our hotel. Popular landmarks nearby include the Historical Peninsula, Levent and Maslak which are the business districts of Istanbul. Unwind in one of our 150 modern guestrooms and suites with terraces overlooking the cozy and airy courtyard or with balconies overlooking the city. Step down to our all-day dining Corte Verde Restaurant to enjoy the delicious selections of Mediterranean cuisine, crafted with guests' wellbeing in mind. Exercise at any hour of the day in WestinWorkout® fitness studio or step outside for a refreshing walk in the nearby parks.Marriott

The rooms also have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and some units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. In-room coffee machine, bottled water, kettle with coffee and tea setup are also offered free of charge. The rooms include a private marble bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. You can start your day with a delicious continental breakfast. There is an extensive variety of restaurants, cafés and shops within the area. A business centre with a fax machine and photocopier is at guests' disposal at Lina Hotel Taksim Pera. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide guidance on what to do in the area. Concierge service is also available. Galata Tower is located 1.2 km away. Dolmabahce Clock Tower is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Istanbul Convention & Exhibition Centre is 1.8 km from the property. Cevahir Mall is 4 km, Zorlu Mall is 7 km and Kanyon Mall is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Ataturk Airport, 14 km from Lina Hotel Taksim Pera.

description: With a stay at Kings Cross Hotel Istanbul, you'll be centrally located in Istanbul, within a 10-minute drive of Taksim Square and Galata Tower. Make yourself at home in one of the 17 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars (stocked with some free items) and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. address: Cankurtaran Mah.Yeni Sarachane Sok. No. 18 Fatih, Istanbul 34122

Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 600 metres from Hagia Sophia, 800 metres from Blue Mosque and 600 metres from Basilica Cistern. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and selected rooms have city views. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers vegetarian, vegan or halal options. At Royan Hotel Hagia Sophia, a member of Radisson Individuals you will find a restaurant serving Turkish and international cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Royan Hotel Hagia Sophia, a member of Radisson Individuals include Column of Constantine, Topkapi Palace and Spice Bazaar. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International, 40 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hampton by Hilton Istanbul Arnavutkoy

description: We're located 10 kilometers from Istanbul Airport and 30 minutes from the Mall of Istanbul with its shops, restaurants, and cinema. Vialand Theme Park is a 35-minute drive, and the Ataturk Olympic Stadium is 22 kilometers away. Get a workout in at our 24-hour fitness center and enjoy our free hot breakfast.Hilton

name: Hotel Ravi
description: Ideally located in the centre of Istanbul, RAVİ HOTEL offers buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At RAVİ HOTEL the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and Basilica Cistern. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, 39 km from RAVİ HOTEL.

name: Nova Plaza Crystal Hotel & Spa
description: The 4-star Nova Plaza Crystal Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Istanbul. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Nova Plaza Crystal Hotel. Internet access – wireless, mini bar, satellite/cable TV can be found in selected guestrooms. Entertain yourself with the property's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, massage. For reliable service and professional staff, Nova Plaza Crystal Hotel caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Hotel Momento - Special Class
description: Hotel Momento is less than 2 km from Topkapi Palace and 1 km from the Blue Mosque. This special class hotel has a 24-hour front desk, a restaurant and free Wi-Fi. All guest rooms at Momento Hotel feature a private bathroom and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Every room is also equipped with a mini-bar, air-conditioning and a safety deposit box. Buffet breakfast is served in the spacious dining area, and Momento’s Restaurant offers delicious examples of Ottoman Imperial and French Cuisine, accompanied by exquisite wines from the hotel’s collection. Hotel Momento is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the nearest train and bus stations, and is 45 km from Istanbul Airport.

name: Galataco Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in Istanbul, GalataCo Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. Taksim Metro Station is 1.7 km from the hotel and Istiklal Street is 1.4 km away. At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. Popular points of interest near GalataCo Hotel include Galata Tower, Spice Bazaar and Taksim Square. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 36 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Adelmar Hotel Istanbul Sisli
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Sisli, ADELMAR HOTEL ISTANBUL promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, private check in/check out, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature bathroom phone, carpeting, cleaning products, clothes rack, complimentary tea. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes ADELMAR HOTEL ISTANBUL the perfect choice for your stay in Istanbul.priceline.com

name: Kaya Istanbul Fair & Convention
description: Located next to the Tüyap Exhibition Centre in Istanbul’s Büyükçekmece district, Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention offers modern rooms with satellite TV. Its health club features panoramic views of the Sea of Marmara. The air-conditioned rooms at Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention are decorated with dark wooden furniture. All rooms have a work desk, a minibar, and an en suite bathroom. Guests can get a relaxing massage at the Palaestra Health Club, which also features a Turkish hammam, an indoor pool, and a fitness centre. The hotel also offers table tennis classes, an outdoor pool, and a tour desk. Rich buffet breakfast is served every morning. The Rolling Rock Café offers exotic cocktails, rock & roll music, and American and Mexican specialties. The Summit Restaurant offers international cuisine and panoramic sea views. Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention is located 35 km from Istanbul’s historic centre, where guests can visit Topkapi Palace, the Blue Mosque, and the Hagia Sophia Museum. The Marmara Park Shopping Centre is 5 km from the hotel. Istanbul Airport is 40 km away.

name: Sude Konak
description: Hotel Sude Konak is located in Gulhane, in the Sultnahmet area, Istanbul's historical peninsula. After a busy day outside, return to the inviting, cool lounge area and relax with a refreshing drink or sit on the terrace and take in the lovely scenery. There is WiFi internet access that is free of charge. Sude Konak offers a variety of comfortable rooms that are clean, air-conditioned and have a private bathroom with amenities. Daily breakfast is served buffet style. The restaurant offers meals from Turkish and international cuisines and samples of Turkish wine are always a part of the menu. At the lobby bar, you can taste various drinks; listen to jazz music, read a book or play chess. Around-the-clock front desk service is also available. Nearby attractions include Blue Mosque, Haghia Sophia, and Topkapi Palace. Car rentals can be arranged by the friendly and attentive staff. Istanbul Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Life Inn Hotel
address: Aksaray Mahallesi Küçüklanga Caddesi No:28 Fatih, Istanbul 34096
description: Conveniently situated in the Fatih district of Istanbul, Life Inn Hotel is located 2 km from Suleymaniye Mosque, 2.8 km from Spice Bazaar and 3.2 km from Blue Mosque. Each accommodation at the 2-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Each room comes with air conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a terrace. At Life Inn Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Basilica Cistern is 3.6 km from the accommodation, while Column of Constantine is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, 37 km from Life Inn Hotel.

name: The Bank Hotel Istanbul, a Member of Design Hotels
address: Emek Yemez mh. Bankalar cd. No 5, Istanbul 34421
description: Housed in a former bank, The Bank Hotel Istanbul is a regal setting for contemporary décor, local art, and cultural events arranged by the in-house curator. The hotel offers the key to Istanbul’s happening Karaköy neighborhood, where hip art galleries and restaurants brush shoulders with local fish markets on the banks of the Bosphorus. The interiors, designed by Sinan Kafadar, breathe life into the grand, marble structure with eclectic pops of color, rich jewel tones, and abstract art. With sweeping views of the Bosphorus and the historic city behind it, one’s eye is often drawn to the scene outside the oversized windows.Marriott

name: Istanbul New Airport Hotel, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description: No description found

name: Grand Abimo Hotel
address: Telsiz Mah Muhammer Aksoy Cad no 16, Istanbul 34010
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace overlooking the Sea of Marmara, this hotel offers modern rooms with massage showers and sea views. With free parking, Grand Bazaar is 5 km away. Offering free WiFi and a satellite LCD TV, all rooms at Grand Abimo Hotel come with a minibar and a seating area. Each room has a modern private bathroom including slippers. Guests can enjoy their breakfast in the sunshine on the terrace and admire the wide views of Istanbul and the water. For lunch and dinner, Diamond City serves à la carte dishes. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car hires and shuttle services to Ataturk Airport, 9 km away. Set in Istanbul’s Zeytinburnu district, the Davutpaşa-Y.T.Ü Metro Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Point Hotel Taksim
description: Located just 500 m from Taksim Square and less than 1 km from the Lutfi Kirdar Congress Center, Point Hotel Taksim offers rooms with free WiFi in modern Istanbul.The dcor of the rooms is light and features natural colours. Each room has double glazed windows for a quiet stay and a sofa. Included are an HD TV, Digiturk and LigTV (football channel). Some of the rooms also include free access to executive lounge.The top-floor View Point restaurant offers sweeping views of the Bosporus and is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is also an authentic Japanese restaurant and 2 caf bars.Point Hotel Taksim's spa area includes an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. A variety of massages and beauty treatments are also available at this Istanbul hotel.Shopping options and public transport are readily available in the hotels surroundings.Acbadem Taksim Hospital is 350 metres, Kolan Hospital is 5.5 km away. With elegants shops and cafs, Niantasi district is 2.5 km away. Zorlu Mall is 6.5 km and Kanyon Mall is 6.7 km from the property. Istanbul Congress Centre,Ataturk Cultural Center and Cemal Resit Rey Concert Hall are within 1 km distance. Istanbul Airport is 48.7 km from Point Hotel Taksim. Private parking at the hotel and airport transfer service is available at an additional fee.iHotelier/iStay

name: White House Hotel Istanbul
address: Alemdar Mah Catalcesme Sok No:21, Istanbul 34110
description: White House Hotel Istanbul boasts a prime location in the heart of the Historical Peninsula, within walking distance to many attractions including Hagia Sophia, the Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar. Elegant furnishings decorate the luxurious rooms. Each is fitted with a wall-mounted, flat-screen TV featuring cable channels. A balcony overlooking Istanbul’s historic district is featured in some rooms. Guests can enjoy breakfast in their rooms or in the hotel's restaurant. There is also a bar and lounge area where a range of refreshing drinks can be sampled. Airport transfer can be arranged upon request for an additional fee. The attentive staff can arrange a rental car, airport shuttle service, or offer tips on what to see and do in the area. White House guests are ideally situated close to many of Istanbul's attractions including Topkapı Palace, Archaeology Museum, the Basilica Cistern and the Spice Bazaar. Istanbul Airport is 53 km away.

name: Meroddi Galata Mansion
address: Sahkulu Mah. Serdar-i Ekrem Cad. No: 29, Istanbul 34420
description: Set on a narrow, cobbled street leading to the Galata Tower, Meroddi Galata Mansion is in a traditional wooden building. With free-WiFi and a 24-hour front desk, it offers simple, air-conditioned rooms. Decorated mainly in white, each room includes a TV, minibar and private bathroom. A generous open buffet breakfast with plenty of hot and cold plates to choose from served daily at the property. There are lots of bars, shops and restaurants on İstiklal Caddesi, a 5-minute walk away. There are also cafés on the street that the hotel is located on. The property is 5 minutes’ walk from a tram stop to Taksim Square, 1.5 km away. Trams also go to Sultanahmet and Dolmabahce Palace, both reached in a journey of less than 10 minutes. The Bosphorus River is a 10-minute walk away. A shuttle is available to Ataturk International Airport, 19 km away. Sabiha Gökçen Airport is 42 km away.

name: Neorion Hotel - Special Class
description: Located in the Old City of Istanbul, this hotel is within walking distance to Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace. It has an indoor swimming pool, a Turkish bath and massage services. Rooms have air conditioning, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms at the Neorion Hotel - Special Class are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. They include a flat-screen TV, a tea/coffee maker and a private bathroom with a bathrobe. In the mornings, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast prepared with seasonal ingredients. During summer, you can enjoy the sunset on the rooftop of Neorion with a complimentary glass of wine. The hotel lounge includes an exhibit of more than 100 replicas of Anatolian Civilizations. Facilities at the Neorion Hotel - Special Class include car hire, ticket service and a tour desk where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. There is also a library stocked with books on Turkish culture and history. The hotel is a short walk from the Grand Bazaar and the Sea of Marmara. Eminonu Ferry Port, 450 metres away, allows easy access to the Asian side or Bosphorus boat tours. You can go to Taksim Square from Sirkeci Tram Stop, 250 metres away. Zorlu Shopping Center is 10 km and Cevahir Mall is 8 km away. Istanbul Airport is 53 km away.

name: Istanbul Marriott Hotel Asia
description: Istanbul is the only city in the world built on two continents; Europe and Asia, stands on the shores of the uniquely beautiful Bosphorus. Discover the beauty of one of the world's most celebrated cities at the Istanbul Marriott Hotel Asia. The hotel is located in the center of the booming business district of Atasehir and offers a refreshing experience for business and leisure travelers. Spacious rooms and suites with high ceiling and panoramic windows are featuring LED screen TVs, high-speed internet, minibar, safe box equipped with plug, in-room kettles and voice mail. Executive rooms located on the top floors of the hotel with a great view across the Marmara Sea, taking into frame the Princes' Islands, the gateway of Istanbul's elite and great place for sightseeing. Guests take advantage of the Istanbul Marriott Hotel Asia's extensive meeting facilities at inside and outside venues, that can accommodate conferences, weddings, car product launches and other special events with the capacity of 5 to 900Marriott

name: Glens Palas Istanbul
address: Harbiye Mah, Abdi Ipekci Cad No 12, Istanbul 34367
description: Featuring a fitness centre, bar and views of sea, Glens Palas Istanbul is located in Istanbul, 2 km from Istanbul Congress Center. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 7 km from Bosphorus Bridge. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel each room comes with a private bathroom. Guests at Glens Palas Istanbul can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Vodafone Park Arena is 1 km from Glens Palas Istanbul. Dolmabahce Palace is 2.2 km from the property, while Taksim Square is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 35 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Beta Hotel
description: No description found

description: Ideally situated in the centre of Istanbul, 24 BOUTİQUE HOTEL features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and a bar. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms will provide guests with a minibar. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or vegetarian options. Speaking English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near 24 BOUTİQUE HOTEL include Istiklal Street, Taksim Square and Taksim Metro Station. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 35 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Germir Palas Hotel - Special Class
description: Germir Palas Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Istanbul. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk are there for guest's enjoyment. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Istanbul has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Germir Palas Hotel.priceline.com

name: Villa Paradiso Hotel
description: Situated 1.2 km from Blue Mosque and 1.2 km from Basilica Cistern, Villa Paradiso Hotel in Istanbul features air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with slippers, a hair dryer and shower. A minibar is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Villa Paradiso Hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A car rental service is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Villa Paradiso Hotel include Hagia Sophia, Column of Constantine and Spice Bazaar. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International, 38 km from the apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sirius Otel Istanbul
description: Sirius Otel İstanbul has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Istanbul. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Sirius Otel İstanbul you will find a restaurant serving American, Argentinian and British cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and dairy-free options can also be requested. Dolmabahce Palace is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Istanbul Congress Center is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 36 km from Sirius Otel İstanbul.

name: Big Life Hotel
description: With a stay at Senbol Suit Hotel in Istanbul (Avcilar), you'll be within a 15-minute walk of Pelican Mall AVM and Istanbul Gelişim University. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Adamar Hotel - Special Class
description: Set on a lively corner in historic Istanbul, Adamar Hotel features a restaurant with rooftop terrace offering splendid views of the nearby Hagia Sophia Mosque and the Bosphorus. Each of the rooms at the Adamar feature bright, soft-tone colours and beds with luxury textiles. They all come equipped with free Wi-Fi and a satellite flat-screen TV. The Panoramic Restaurant serves Turkish specialities and international fare, either indoors or on the roof terrace with great city views. The hotel lobby features a stylish cyber café and cafeteria, offering drinks and snacks. Sultanahmet Tram Stop is just 250 metres from the hotel. The Basilica Cisterns, Blue Mosque and Roman Hippodrome are all under 5 minutes’ walk away. Istanbul Airport is within 53 km.

name: Istanbul City Airport Hotel
address: İslambey Mahallesi Gülcü sokak no: 2 Arnavutköy no:2, Istanbul 34275
description: No description found

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Vadistanbul
address: Ayazaga Mahallesi, Cendere Caddesi 109-111A 1; Sar, Istanbul 34396
description: Situated in Istanbul and with Istinye Park reachable within 5.3 km, Radisson Collection Hotel, Vadistanbul features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub and a hammam. The accommodation provides room service, a business centre and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Radisson Collection Hotel, Vadistanbul rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a sauna, or in the garden. Speaking Arabic, English, French and Turkish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Nef Stadium is 5.8 km from the accommodation, while Istanbul Sapphire is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 29 km from Radisson Collection Hotel, Vadistanbul, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Marmara Pera
description: Situated in Istanbul's trendy and hip area in Beyoglu where the ancient history meets modern life, this stylish hotel features a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool overlooking the lively streets of Istanbul. The area is popular for soaking up to local culture, shopping and entertainment along with many unique restaurants to taste a wide array of dishes of Turkish and international cuisines. Istiklal Street and Demiroren Shopping Mall is just a few steps away and various means of transportation of metro, tram and buses can be accessed in the surrounding area, offering easy transportation through all parts of the city. The Long live Pera is an environmentally friendly accommodation. The classy rooms of this pet-friendly hotel features flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, safe box and an electric kettle. The Long live Pera offers international and Turkish cuisine, snacks and refreshing drinks. The Mikla Restaurant provides new Anatolian cuisine with panoramic Bosphorus views. There are also numerous restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk. The Long live Pera features a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Wireless internet is free of charge in the entire hotel. A pillow menu will be offered for your comfort. You can discover the area, local shops and cafés by walking through the colourful streets reaching to the famous Galata Tower or Taksim Square within a 10-minute walk distance. Cevahir Shopping Mall is 4 km away, while OzdilekPark and Kanyon malls are 7 km from the hotel. Acibadem Taksim Hospital is 1.8 km away and Madame Tussauds Museum is a 10-minute walk from The Long live Pera. Istanbul Airport is 48.5 km away from The Marmara Pera. On-site car parking is available for a daily fee.

name: Nova Plaza Pera
address: Catma Mescit Mahallesi, Hayratci Sokak No 1-3 Beyoglu, Istanbul 34430
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace and views of pool, Nova Plaza Pera is located in Istanbul, 1.8 km from Galata Tower. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel each room has a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Nova Plaza Pera can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Istiklal Street is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Spice Bazaar is 2.9 km away. Guests can benefit from the free shuttle service to Taksim Square. Cevahir Mall is 5.6 km while Demiroren Mall is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 37 km from Nova Plaza Pera, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Valide Sultan Konagi
address: Cankurtaran Mah. Kutlugun Sok. No/1, Istanbul 34122
description: Located in the heart of the historic Sultanahmet, Valide Sultan Konagi is set in a 17-room mansion, 270 metres from Hagia Sophia. It offers a terrace with stunning views of the Bosphorus and the Old City. WiFi is accessible throughout the premises free of charge. Decorated in a classical style, the elegant rooms at Valide Sultan Konagi feature hypoallergenic goose feather pillows, blanket and marble or tile paved private bathrooms. Each air-conditioned unit has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a seating area and a minibar. A safety deposit box is standard in every room. Every morning, complimentary buffet breakfast is served on the terrace of the mansion, accompanied by sea views. There is also a bar on site and room service is available. The staff, available 24 hours a day, assists with car rentals and provides information about local attractions. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are also offered. Free on-site parkinig is possible. Topkapi Palace and Blue Mosque are just a few steps from the property. Grand Bazaar is 1.5 km away. Ataturk Airport is within 20 km while Istanbul Airport is 54 km away.

name: Dosso Dossi Hotels Old City
address: Alemdar Mah Alay Köskü Cad No:12, Istanbul 34110
description: Located in Sultanahmet district, Dosso Dossi Hotels Old City is within a walking distance from historical sites such as Hagia Sophia Museum, Basilica Cistern and the Blue Mosque. Sultanahmet Tram Station is just a 4-minute walk from Dosso Dossi. The property offers facilities including a Turkish bath, a sauna, and a fitness centre. The rooms of the hotel are equipped with soundproofing. 24-hour front desk, concierge service and free WiFi is also available throughout. Featuring a stylish décor, all rooms at Dosso Dossi Hotels Old City are equipped with air conditioning, an LCD TV with satellite channels, minibar, a safe box, electric kettle and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms also have a desk, sofa and a coffee machine. Dosso Dossi Hotels Old City is a unique child-friendly city hotel. The hotel welcomes children with toys. Special kid's menus and buffet are also served. Daily milk, fruit yoghurt and fresh fruits are also provided for your children. A feeding chair, stroller, baby bathrobes, baby bathtub are also offered for your convenience. Special DVDs and TV channels are available for children as well. You can enjoy rich buffet breakfast in the mornings. Guests can try various Turkish dishes and vegetarian dishes in Tulip Restaurant or have refreshments and beverages at Iobby bar. The property also serves night soup. Guests can relax at the hotel's traditional Turkish bath, sauna and steam room after a busy day. A fully-equipped modern fitness centre is also available. Traditional and modern massage sessions are offered upon request. The hotel is 4.3 km from Taksim Square and 46 km from Sabiha Gokcen Airport. The nearest airport is Ataturk Airport, 20 km away where airport shuttle can be arranged at a surcharge. Istanbul Airport is 52 km away.

name: The Story Hotel Pera
description: This hotel offers modern rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, just 20 metres away from shopping street Istiklal Avenue in Istanbul’s Beyoglu district. Facilities include a 24-hour reception. The air-conditioned rooms of The Story Hotel Pera feature elegant dark wooden furniture and high ceilings. All rooms include a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities, and a work desk. Some rooms also have a kitchenette. The Story Hotel Pera is 3 km from Istanbul’s Old Town, including Hagia Sophia and Topkapi Palace. You can easily access Cevahir Shopping Mall, using metro. Lively Cicek Pasaji is within a walking distance, and Taksim Square is only a 15-minute walk away.

name: Ortakoy Hotel
address: Mecidiye Mah. Saglik Sk No1 Ortakoy, Istanbul 34347
description: Set in Istanbul, 2.6 km from Dolmabahce Palace, Ortaköy Hotel features a bar and views of the city. The property is located 3.2 km from Dolmabahce Clock Tower, 4.9 km from Istanbul Congress Center and 5.1 km from Taksim Metro Station. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms come with a kettle, while some rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Ortaköy Hotel every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Taksim Square is 5.1 km from Ortaköy Hotel, while 15 July Martyrs Bridge is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 38 km from the hotel.

name: Mövenpick Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen Airport
address: Yenisehir Mah Millet Cad No 31, Istanbul 34912
description: Mövenpick Hotel Istanbul Asia Airport is located in Kurtkoy, 1 km to Viaport Shopping Mall. Sabiha Gokcen Airport is less than 5 km. Mövenpick Hotel Istanbul Asia Airport has 294 rooms overlooking the city view, rooms are all equipped wit h LED TV, safe box and minibar. A trendy atmosphere in its own special designed lobby, terrace, restaurant and halls, decorated with style, cultural touches are also applied. Free parking space is available.accorhotels.com

name: Orka Taksim Suites & Hotel
address: Kuloglu Mahallesi Agahamami Cd No:18, Istanbul 34433
description: Located in the heart of the city, Orka Taksim Suites & Hotel is just 400 metres from Istiklal Avenue as well as 550 metres from Galataport and Karakoy Harbor. The hotel offers luxurious rooms with soundproofing, free Wi-Fi. Tastefully furnished in modern-retro style, the rooms of Orka Taksim Suites & Hotel include a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a modern bathroom with free toiletries. Each room offers a French balcony overlooking the street. The Da Lino and Gloria Jeans restaurants of Orka Taksim Suites & Hotel combine local cuisine with different tastes. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. For lunch and dinner, an à la carte menu is available. Taksim Square is 600 metres away. There are numerous restaurants, cafés, bars and shops within walking distance. Galata Tower is 1 km from the hotel. Sabiha Gokcen Airport is 40 km away. Istanbul Airport is 51 km from the property.
